skills.skill: third party due diligence screening reports

duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and address potential compliance issues based on risk criteria and regulations.
Conduct due diligence research and screening reports to ensure compliance with regulations.
Utilize exceptional communication and analytical skills to assess and manage compliance issues.
Work independently or collaboratively to address compliance challenges based on project needs.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously to ensure timely and effective compliance measures.
Analyze and report on the results of compliance efforts, providing data-driven insights for continuous improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
